name: Funding Circle Ltd
goal: Funding Circle (www.fundingcircle.com) is the world’s leading lending platform for small businesses, matching investors to businesses who want to grow in the UK, U.S. and Europe. Since launching in 2010, investors at Funding Circle – including 70,000 individuals, local and national government and financial institutions – have lent more than $5 billion to more than 40,000 businesses globally.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Taxation
euInitiatives: Capital Markets Union Package (in particular the  initiative on Financial Technology (FinTech) and proposals for an EU framework on crowd and peer to peer finance); Digital Single Market Initiatives; Prospectus Directive
